texts.text: Ah my firewo-- Ahem... I mean good job!
You seem to be very a very capable sla--..er.. adventurer
This is my apprentice, Rin. She always wants to go on adventures.
You guys should form a party!
Bruh this this dude is kinda sus, he's just a random person you found in the woods
texts.title: Rin

texts.text: He's trustworthy. He got my firewood.
texts.title: Luna

texts.text: Isn't gathering firewood something that even a malicious person could do?
texts.title: Rin

texts.text: Y-Yes master.. I mean no master
texts.title: Rin
Luna
texts.text: As you guys get more comrades, your party will get stronger. Maybe you guys can even beat that demon lord.
